Package grith.sibboleth

Sibboleth client library

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CredentialManager An interface to be able to connect to the CredentialManager Python object from the sibboleth.credentials module.
ShibbolethClient Interface that is needed for the whole (j/p)ython - Java wrapping.
ShibListener Interface that can be used to monitor the login process.
ShibLoginEventSource Used for the (j/p)ython - Java wrapping.
 

Class Summary
DummyCredentialManager Dummy implementation of a CredentialManager.
DummyIdpObject Dummy implementation of an IdpObject.
IdpObject Along with the Shibboleth and CredentialManager classes/interfaces a central part of sibboleth, it holds a list of IdPs and traverses through levels of IdPs as the user navigates through them.
OneTimeStaticCredentialManager An implementation of an CredentialManager that can be used from within graphical user interfaces to login to a shib instance.
Shibboleth Central wrapper class that imports the Shibboleth class from the sibboleth.shibboleth.py python module.
ShibLoginDialog An example Swing JDialog.
ShibLoginPanel Reusable Swing component that can be used to display a shib-login component in your Swing app.
StaticCredentialManager An implementation of an CredentialManager that can be used from within, for example, commandline user interfaces to login to a shib instance.
StaticIdpObject Implementation of an IdpObject that can be used to login to Shibboleth if/once the desired IdP is known.
TestClass  
 

Exception Summary
CredentialManagerException  
 

Package grith.sibboleth Description

Sibboleth client library
